application.doc: Creating a new group in the registry

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the groups resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the new group. Names may only consist of alpha-numeric characters and the following symbols: '-' '_' '.'.

param.name: users
param.doc: A list of users that will be members of the new group.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
